  • The knobs are made with embossed design, providing a premium feel and a refined visual appeal

settings.bottom_description: Advanced dimming technology with multiple features
settings.bottom_point_1: Minimum brightness adjustment to avoid flickering of the light
settings.bottom_point_2: Maximum brightness adaptive, automatically eliminating flickering
settings.bottom_point_3: BACKLIGHT function, enabling stable lighting even at low brightness
settings.bottom_point_4: Forward and backward cut mode (automatically/manually switchable), compatible with more lamps
settings.bottom_point_5: Soft and gradual lighting on, protecting the lamps and extending their lifespan
settings.bottom_point_6: Lighting memory function, maintaining the preferred brightness at any time
settings.bottom_point_7: Support for multi-channel linkage control (Master + Master)
